text: Ani je sukha-sampanna avasthepurvica tumacyajavala sikseci yacana karanyata gha'i karita aheta, nihsansaya, tyancyapurvi (udaharanadakhala) siksa-yatana alelya aheta, ani nihsansaya tumaca palanakarta mapha karanara ahe, lokancya anucita atyacaranantarahi ani niscitaca tumaca palanakarta kathora danda denarahi ahe
